channel.title: Vps runer.bat problem!
channel.description:
ive recent bought a vps and the runner.bat has not show any problems previously on my normal pc but when i run it on the vps (i have download java and the development kit, i can compile but can run) it comes up with this message.
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue
my runner.bat code is as follows
@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
Any help would be greatly appreciated Thanks james

item.title: Vps runer.bat problem!
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

I think you need too type in the new version of java you have downloaded or the new version of jdk which ever one works.

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue

Thanks james
[/quote]

Ty - Tension Ltd

Read full topic
